name: Hotel Los Arcos

reviews.text: Among the few hotels in Catemaco, Hotel los Arcos offers a good value. It is a simple place with no frills. The amenities are basic, but enough to make your stay comfortable. The bathroom is rather small and dark, but very clean, which I liked most about the hotel. They offer you free coffee 24 hours, and the staffs are very kind and helpful. The hotel has a huge parking space. Their online booking system is reliable and efficient.
reviews.title: A good value in Catemaco

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is located in the center of town, and you can easily reach any point of Catemaco. However, due to its centric location it can be quite noisy till late at night. There is a pool, and many guests with children lounge around the pool till late. Actually the noise from the pool (mostly cries of the children) was more annoying than that of the street. However, since I was out all day long, the noise was bearable.
reviews.title: Perfectly Charming

aka: Hotel Los Arcos Catemaco, Mexico - Veracruz
